alert.note: Alert for Gray; Haskell; Meade; Seward (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:47PM CDT until June 15 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SEWARD...MEADE...SOUTHERN GRAY AND HASKELL COUNTIES... At 447 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ingalls to 8 miles north of Plains to 6 miles south of Hayne, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...60 mph gust at the Sublette airport at 435 PM. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Liberal, Meade, Sublette, Satanta, Montezuma, Kismet, Copeland, Ensign, Meade State Park, Missler, Tice, Hayne, The Haggard Elev and Plains. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
